modName: Body By Race - Skyrim - CBBE - BBP
summary:
Gives each player race a indivdual body.
(Female only)
descriptionHtml:
Body By Race - Skyrim
(Female only)

Gives each (Female)player race a indivdual body, made with BodySlide.
(So you will need the CBBE V3 Textures)

The point?
So that there is verity in the Female bodys you will find around the wastes.

For example: 
All Elves are skiny with small to mid brests.
Nords are big girls with mid to big brests.
Inperials are well rounded.
Orcs are buff with small to mid brests.
Bretons are plump with mid to big brests.
Redgard are curvy with big to Big brests.
Ect.

I have tryed to give each race a body that is lore frendly.

Note:
At no stage have I used the Silly huge slider. 
All the bodys are what I think is good. 
Your opinion may be diffarant to mine.
Custimashion is easy, Just replace the bodys that start with BBR.

Note 2:
This mod is a hard and fast hack. Dous anyone rember my Body Control for F3/NV?
This is a Much simpler mod as it only has one texture set.
If I get enough requests I\'ll make a Body Control Skyrim.
Currents votes (Mine) are for CBBE,UNP and CHBBP.

Note 3:
At this stage if you download it and like it you would do me a bigger faviour uploading some pic\'s then endorsing.
I make my page\'s public viewable so no pics uploaded buy me. But I realy do need some there. This mod has a realy small Views/Download reatio, and people its cool as.
Give it enough downloads and I might even go all FEM on it. Skyrim is SO set up to do a FEM. And one know what I am talking about?
author: JoshNZ
